import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; export default function Movie(props) { const movie = useSelector(store => store.movies.movies).some(movie=>movie) console.log(movie) return (

{movie.title}

{movie.genres.join(', ')}

{movie.plot}

{movie.year} {movie.runtime}dk
) };
